title: 4 win Ip boost still here?
body: Can we still get the ip boost after all this time? (From Email Verification)

replies.body: It should still be active, yes!  I saw that you verified your email, did you just do so recently?  Did you get the IP boost on your account?
I did so it recently, (About 4 days ago)  and didnt get the IP Boost, is it like this for everyone in NA?

You get it only once. It should show up immediately (it didn't do so on EUNE for a while, but now it's fixed). If you don't get the boosts, just contact Rito support, they'll respond like within 30-60 mins and the human or bot will give you the boost.
